title: "attempting to reconnect" when i'm kinda connected
body:
same computer i'm using to create this post. I'm getting partials of chat "ally has been slain" stuff ect. but it's still saying "attempting to reconnect"

it makes no sense to me

replies.body: Your network may be having some issues holding a strong connection, so the server is trying to relocate you and get you back in.  Check out the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and see if that can help get things fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.

NA is freaking out right now. 
Everyone everywhere on the server is DC'ing randomly or just not connecting.
